```diff
+         
+         db.commit()
+         print("ğŸ‰ æ•°æ®åº“è¿ç§»å®Œæˆï¼")
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         db.rollback()
+         print(f"âŒ è¿ç§»å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+     finally:
+         db.close()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     print("å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œæ•°æ®åº“è¿ç§»...")
+     add_company_info_fields() 
```

</details>
